|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612E; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Huawei WS860s Description=== 
• Model: Huawei WS860s
• Device Type: Wireless router
• CPU: Routing Dual Core @1.0GHz CPU
     + Media Dual Core @1.5GHz CPU
• RAM: 1GB DDR3, ROM: 4GB eMMC
• WAN ports: 1
• LAN ports: 2
• SD card slot: 1
• USB port: USB 2.0 (1 unit)
• Audio ports: 3.5mm audio output
• Video ports: HDMI (1 unit)
• Output resolution: 1080p/720p
• Maximum bit rate: 50Mbps
• Max. LAN data rate: 300Mbs
• Operating dual system: Android 4.2 + Linux
• Wireless transmission rate:
  2.4GHz band: 300Mbps; 5GHz band: 867Mbps
• Wireless transmission protocol:
  802.11b/g/n 2.4GHz; 802.11a/n/ac 5GHz
• Hard disk: SATA 3.0 interface (9.5mm thickness),
  the need to buy their own, max. support 4TB 2.5"
• Video playback: HD video local playback
  MKV, RM, RMVB, AVI, WMV, ASF, MP4, MOV,
  M4V, TS, FLV, 3GP, 3G2, DivX, M2TS, MTS
• Audio Player: 
  MP3, WMA, WAV, AAC, FLAC, APE, MID, OGG, M4A
• Image formats: JPEG, BMP, GIF, PNG, TIFF, etc.
• Subtitle: pgs, srt, smi, sub, ssa, ass, idx+sub
• Power Button, WPS Button: Support
• Restore factory settings: Support
• A key to copy key: Support
• Remote Control: Infrared remote control
• Other: Power Interface
• Total power consumption: <23W
• Power supply: 12V/2A
• Dimensions: 123mm x 123mm x 263mm
• Weight: about 1138g
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://techsku.ru/Huawei/2014/05/17/snimki-marshrutizatora-ws860s-ot-huawei.html Images ''Huawei WS860s'' on '''techsku'''] :OUI: 20:08:ED (Huawei Corp.) *[http://www.amazon.com/Huawei-wireless-Android-2-5inch-Storage/dp/B00UR7WMWA/ ''Huawei Honor Cube WS860s Wireless Router'' on '''Amazon'''] :CPU @1.5GHz (Android 4.2 / Linux) :HDD 2.5" 1TB SATA 3.0 Storage (version TV Box) *[http://www.gizok.com/huawei-ws860s-tv-box-storage-route.html ''Huawei Honor Cube WS860s'' on '''gizok'''] ==See also== *[[Huawei WS831 (Honor Cube)]] *[http://www.aliexpress.com/store/product/100-Original-Huawei-WS831-Honor-Wireless-Home-White-Router-Support-2-4G-5G-WiFi-1GHz-CPU/600815_32332038890.html ''Huawei WS831 Honor'' on '''AliExpress'''] :CPU: Hi5650H @1GHz dual-core ARM :RAM: 128MB (DDR3), Flash: 16MB (SPI) :OUI: E0:19:1D (Huawei Corp.) *[http://www.au.kddi.com/english/mobile/product/wlan/home_spot_cube_2/spec/ KDDI Home Spot Cube2 Router] [[Category:English Documentation]]
